metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1809 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Gambas before 3.4.0 allows remote attackers to move or manipulate directorycontents or perform symlink attacks due to the creation of insecuretemporary directories.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1809` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gambas3 - 3.5.4-1ubuntu1
gambas3-examples - 3.5.4-1ubuntu1
gambas3-gb-args - 3.5.4-1ubuntu1

criterions.comment: gambas3 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.4-1ubuntu1').
